structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Crimes Against Chastity, Morality, Decency And Good Order

law.catch_line: Motor Vehicles; Striking, Injuring Or Killing Dogs Or Cats
law.text: The operator of a motor vehicle that strikes and injures or kills a dog or cat shall forthwith report such an accident to the owner or custodian of said dog or cat or to a police officer in the town wherein such accident has occurred. A violation of this section shall be punished by a fine of not more than fifty dollars.
